amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which allows the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to waive requirements that certain activities benefit persons of low and moderate income.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike and insert certain language regarding the disallowance of requirement waivers as it relates to low and moderate incomes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.
